verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Majesty, worship His majesty.
Unto Jesus, be all glory, honor and praise.
Majesty, kingdom authority
Flows from His throne unto His own,
Who His anthem raise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So exalt, lift up on high, the name of Jesus.
Magnify, come glorify, Christ Jesus the King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Majesty, worship His majesty.
Jesus who died, now glorified, King of all Kings.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Majestad, adora su majestad,
Sea Cristo gloria honor y poder
Majestad, adara su majestad

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Cristo murio y resucito es Rey de reyes
Exaltad, glorificad el nombre de Cristo

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Adorad, magnificad a Cristo el Rey.
Majestad, adora su mejestad
Cristo murio y resucito es Rey de reyes
